txt.en:
'The people of Wildermore have much to be thankful for, [placeholder], despite the destruction wrought by the giant Núrzum. The folk of Scylfig celebrate by holding a small festival outside their town.

'You should go there at once and join the festivities. I hear that they are holding an eating contest outside the gates of their city. The survivors are few, but their hearts are emboldened!

'A friend of mine, Wulfherr, is overseeing the festivities. He will be able to provide you with everything you need. Let me know when you are ready to go to Scylfig, and I will arrange your travel.'

'[placeholder] from far away lands! We are pleased that you can join us in our celebration!

'Here you will find a sport that any and all may participate in, regardless of age! While we are few, we have prepared a marvelous eating contest. The point is simply to consume as much food as you are able in the time allotted.

'Be careful, though... some foods may slow you down! We shall begin soon. Speak to the Event Coordinator when your are ready to begin.'
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Gyric is waiting for your decision in Forlaw.\n\nYou should speak with Gyric when you are ready to travel to Scylfig in the Writhendowns and talk to Wulfherr to join the festivities.
The Event Coordinator is standing next to Wulfherr.\n\nYou should speak with the Event Coordinator when you are ready to begin.
'You should speak with Wulfherr when you arrive in Scylfig.'
Talk to Gyric to travel to Scylfig in the Writhendowns and speak with Wulfherr
Tables with food may be found outside the gates of Scylfig.\n\nEat as much food as possible before time runs out.
'You must have come hungry! A voracious eater and our victor!'
'You must have come hungry! A voracious eater and our victor!'
'I hope I can eat fast enough!'
'You should speak with Wulfherr when you arrive in Scylfig.'
The people of Scylfig celebrate the end of the giant Núrzum.
'Are you ready to begin? Good!\n\n'There are four tables... you may eat or drink from any of them. You are in competition with these good folk, so be as quick as you can!'
